name: On Black Midnight Tee
description: A classic black t-shirt with a subtle yet stylish logo on the chest. The 'On Black' brand is a nod to its deep, rich color. Made with a comfortable, cotton-like material, this tee is a versatile addition to any wardrobe. The back features a bold QR code and a statement of its Cameroonian origin.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, black color, white and black logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner, 'ON BLACK ORIGINALS MADE IN CAMEROON' and a QR code on the back.

name: On Black Mocha Tee
description: This t-shirt in a warm, rich mocha brown is perfect for a relaxed, earthy look. It features the same iconic 'On Black' logo in a contrasting white, adding a clean and modern touch. The cotton-like fabric ensures all-day comfort.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, brown color, white logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner.

name: On Black Rosewood Tee
description: A vibrant and playful t-shirt in a cheerful rose pink. The white 'On Black' logo stands out against the bright background. The soft, cotton-like material makes this a comfortable and fashionable choice.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, pink color, white logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner.

name: On Black Scarlet Tee
description: This bold and striking scarlet red t-shirt is designed to make a statement. The black 'On Black' logo provides a sharp contrast, creating a dynamic and edgy look. The material is soft and breathable for everyday wear.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, red color, black logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner.

name: On Black Sunset Tee
description: Capture the warmth of a sunset with this vibrant orange t-shirt. The black 'On Black' logo adds a touch of cool sophistication to the bright color. This tee is perfect for adding a pop of color to your casual outfits.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, orange color, black logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner.

name: On Black Ivory Tee
description: A clean, crisp white t-shirt that serves as a timeless staple. The black 'On Black' logo creates a simple yet powerful aesthetic. Made from a soft, cotton-like fabric, this shirt is a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, white/ivory color, black logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner.

name: On Black Ocean Tee
description: Inspired by the clear waters of the ocean, this t-shirt in a refreshing blue/turquoise hue is both stylish and comfortable. The white 'On Black' logo adds a crisp and clean finish. This tee is a great way to add a calming, cool tone to your look.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, blue/turquoise color, white logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner.
